entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who is working on homework and has a Firebolt.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is also working on homework.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione warned Ron and Harry that they would fail their O.W.L.s if they didn't work hard.

relationships.description: Harry has an essay assigned by Sprout on Self-Fertilizing Shrubs.
Ron and Harry are working on a project with McGonagall's Inanimatus Conjur us.
Harry is influenced by Hermione's warnings that he would fail his O.W.L.s if he didn't work hard.
Ron and Harry are friends who are working on homework together.
